about_the_game:
The Huey Last Show is a story-based campaign that will test your skills as a helicopter pilot, in 15 missions you will be facing various challenges and various missions while confronting the forces of the Soviet Union.

It is the 14th of January 1979. The Black Jacks 4th Aviation Regiment is being deployed to Krasnodar to support the UN resolution for the Independence of the former Soviet Union provinces. In a relatively moderate response, US President Jimmy Carter and the other NATO countries are deploying a force consisting of elements from the 9th Infantry Division, 6th Cavalry Air Brigade, an MAU from the 1st Marine Division, and SOC from Green Berets, SAS, and SASR. USAF is preparing 3 squadrons of F5-E and 2 squadrons of F4-E to provide air support.

Campaign features:
  • 15 story-driven missions
  • Over 2000 voiceovers
  • Late 1970’s units
  • Full-scale conflict will progress throughout the campaign.
  • Various missions: SAR, RESCAP, Gunship, Transport, SOC Ops.
  • Detailed briefings, kneeboard files, and supporting documentation for each mission

Required modules:
DCS: UH-1H Huey by Belsimtek
DCS: Caucasus map

Localization:
Voiceovers: English
Briefings/Subtitles: English

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum
  • Requires:Digital Combat Simulator
    OS *: Windows 8, 10, 11
  • CPU: Intel or AMD 3.0Ghz+ with 2 cores or more
  • RAM: 8GB+ RAM
  • Video: Discrete AMD or NVIDIA 4GB+
  • DLC size: 250MB
  • Input: Joystick
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended
  • Requires:Digital Combat Simulator
    OS *: Windows 8, 10, 11
  • CPU: Intel or AMD 4.5Ghz+ with 6 cores or more
  • RAM: 32GB+ RAM
  • Video: Discrete AMD or NVIDIA 8GB+
  • DLC size: 250MB
  • Input: Joystick and Pedals
